## Week 04 Update!
[30% of the way there!]{.hi}

As we continue to march forward through the term, do not forget to at least tangentially be working on your [Final Project](Assignments/final-project.qmd){target=_blank .hi-orange}. 
If you need any help, [please ask]{.hi} I am happy to help in whatever way I can. 

Reminder that the [Problem Set 02](Assignments/Problem-Sets/PS02/ps02.pdf){target=_blank .hi-green} is due [Wednesday at 11:59am]{.hi}

This week's schedule involves:

&nbsp;&nbsp;  {{< fa book-open size=lg >}} &nbsp; Complete [Lecture 03 - Underdevelopment](Lectures/03-Underdevelopment/030-compile.html){.hi-green target=_blank}

&nbsp;&nbsp;  {{< fa book-open size=lg >}} &nbsp; Complete [Lecture 04 - Poverty & Inequality](Lectures/04-Poverty-and-Inequity/040-compile.html)

&nbsp;&nbsp;  {{< fa book-open size=lg >}} &nbsp; Start Lecture 05 - Human Capital

I have also written up instructions in order to set expectations of the [Annotated Bibliography](https://canvas.uoregon.edu/courses/274682/assignments/1916913){.hi-orange target=_blank} which is due until [Week 06 (11/05)]{.hi-orange}. 
You can find them [here](Assignments/Final-Project/02-Annotated-Bib/annotated-bib.pdf){.hi-orange target=_blank} or in the [Final Project Tab](Assignments/final-project.qmd){.hi-orange target=_blank}
